WHERE 1=1
A.CNT_CDE like #CNT_CDE# || '%'
A.CNT_NUM like '%' || #CNT_NUM# || '%'

decode(A.TCT_AMT, NULL, A.TCT_AMT, 0) >= #TCT_AMT_FROM#
decode(A.TCT_AMT, NULL, A.TCT_AMT, 0) <= #TCT_AMT_TO#
A.BEG_YMD >= decode(length(#BEG_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#BEG_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '10000101')

WHERE 1=1

decode(A.TCT_AMT, NULL, A.TCT_AMT, 0) >= #TCT_AMT_FROM#
decode(A.TCT_AMT, NULL, A.TCT_AMT, 0) <= #TCT_AMT_TO#
A.BEG_YMD >= decode(length(#BEG_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#BEG_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '10000101')
